g.text: Generate HTML files for a static image hosting website.
show this help message and exit
Name of the author of the images.
File extensions to include (can be specified multiple times).
Specify the license type for the images.
Run in non-interactive mode, disabling progress bars.
Regenerate thumbnails even if they already exist.
Title of the image hosting site.
Base URL of the web root for the image hosting site.
Folders to exclude from processing, globs supported (can be specified multiple times).
Ignore files that do not match the specified extensions.
Path to the CSS theme file.
Enable fancy folder view instead of the default Apache directory listing.
show program's version number and exit
